review: I have visited for the Dental filling of my child .She is very cooperative and kids friendly.I strongly recommend her for kids

Dr. Preetha was very friendly to our son and could manage to conduct the necessary checks by getting him to co-operate through continuous conversation. She explained her findings in detail and also recommended steps we could take to keep his teeth healthy. It was a great experience for us.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: we have been visiting the doctor for my son since 5 years now. she never recommends anything if it is not absolutely required. she is true to her profession. Also smiles and more clinic, where she visits does not involve in her work. true it is with her and the clinic that they contribute to dental healthcare !

review: Went for my son's dental treatment. Though my son was very much restless the doctor was patient enough to carry out the procedure.. very satisfied

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She is a really nice doctor and handles kids really well....parents would feel confident when go for any procedure for their kids as doctor is reliable and really good at her job .....would recommend for her
